message.body: Can't open the YouTube link. Post it on my FB
HEY!
Whoa, hey. What's up?
Whats the melody that you emailed me?0
It's called "I can dream, can't I?" by the Andrews sisters
Something to listen to! How are you Marf?
You're in rare form...? I'm pretty great. How are you?
Rare form? The last time you showed me a song I listened to the album the whole tour on repeat... I'm sweaty and tired from rockin' and rollin'. We're in Orlando

The andrew sisters didnt really work in album format - it was the days of Cole porter, recycling songs, etc etc so I think you're safe. When I heard it i got completely obsessed, it stopped me in my tracks. Easily one of the most beautiful and haunting phrases that I've ever heard.
And I attribute the rare form comment to your use of caps lock and the preposition at the end of a sentence. But you're probably just sweaty and still rockin' a little bit
You're smart and stuff. I am still kinda rockin'
http://open.spotify.com/track/1UPer6OBVmem393MY91WPX
Does this mean you like the other one?
Very much so
Ugh Luke Skidmore.
Hello?
I wish I understood the dynamic of our relationship, past and present, better
We should have a conversation about it then.
No, it's something that I'll find. It will mean more that way. You and I stepped into some weird territory and I either need to leave it or learn how to speak the language.
If you need to talk, you can always just call
Thanks, same to you. When do you get back to Nashville?
Early tomorrow. Last night on tour. Everyone is ready to be home
How long will you be home?
Till my sisters graduation in December. Were going to Europe next year!
Beautiful.
Yeah girl
How is your heart
I can't trust people's feelings for me
People's or mine?
Hah, any and all... But I said what I meant.
When did the trust issues first start Ms. Stuckey?
Oh man, I shouldnt have brought it up
Ok. I can see you're it's not a light hearted matter. You do fluff up seriousness sometimes so I thought to play it that way but if it's serious serious, than what's going on Martha?
No, thats not why I said that I shouldn't have brought it up. Thank you for being sensitive to me and my tendencies though.
Claro que si
